entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect if evaluation results in `if (true != true)` being true #103786
  • System.Text.Json.Nodes.Tests.JsonObjectTests.NullPropertyNameFail [FAIL] #103784
  • Review contatenation logic in the Wasm SDK #103783
  • Consider using SimdUnicode.UTF8.GetPointerToFirstInvalidByte for UTF-8 validation #103781
    Future
  • The logic for skipping the download of a local SDK (`/.dotnet`) can lead to build breaks #103776
  • Crash when debugging with lldb on MacOS #103770
  • [API Proposal]: TensorPrimitives: convert Span<Byte> to Span<Float> and back #103756
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandlerFunctional.Tests.BidirectionStreamingTest.BackwardsCompatibility_DowngradeToHttp11 #103754
  • [Test Failure] System.IO.Tests.InternalBufferSizeTests.FileSystemWatcher_InternalBufferSize #103753
  • CILJit::compileMethod :: Slow processing #103751
    9.0.0
  • Create native host for application with only runtime installed #103746
  • Incorrect time patterns for some cultures on browser in `HybridGlobalization` #103745
  • AppHost.Bundle.Tests.BundledAppWithSubDirs.FrameworkDependent(options: None) failed in CI #103743
  • SIGSEGV in netcoredbg when running on Linux with musl libc #103741

Closed

  • CurrencyNegativePattern is set to 1(instead of 0) when getting "en-US" culture in .NET 8. #103644
  • Building hosted blazor wasm app in docker results in exception 'DefineStaticWebAssetEndpoints' with dotnet 9 #103767
  • Should we Dispose DefaultAssemblyResolver in SpaceAnalyzer #103581
  • Nullability headaches with IComparer and IEqualityComparer #103780
  • Add "hints" in Metric API to provide things like histogram bounds #63650
    9.0.0
  • Ask for the "PrivacyInfo.xcprivacy" required by Apple #103691
  • STJ NullPropertyNameFail test failing in CI #103715
  • [MONO] * Assertion: should not be reached at `/__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/mini/interp/interp.c:3850` #103698
  • Instrument type parameter could be restricted #98763
  • Counter generated from System.Diagnostic.Metrics resets to zero. #102653
  • Some Merged Tests Will Never Fail or Pass Correctly Due to a Void Return Value #92381
    9.0.0
  • Counter generated from System.Diagnostic.Metrics resets to zero. #103670
  • What runtime should i get if not desktop? #103749
  • TimeSpan.Parse(string) converts hour values > 24 to day values #101187
  • NativeAOT legs timing out in CI #102239
  • Implicit DateTime to DateTimeOffset conversion throws exception. An analyzer could help catch? #99828
  • [API Proposal]: TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds which take a single argument #100654
  • ImageConverter not found in .Net Standard lib referenced by .Net Framework 4.7.2 app #103702
    9.0.0
  • Preparing For Removing macIOS dependencies from Binding Tools for Swift #98165
    9.0.0
  • [mono] Interpreter and MiniJIT Libraries Test CI is timing-out #103688
  • Inline array Equals unexpected behavior #96943
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Marshalling structs containing strings/interfaces #88284
    9.0.0
  • Issue with Options having an array property that is added twice #100948
  • Date Time to string conversion Non-Breaking Space Being added when running in an Azure App Service Linux hosting .NET 8 #103750
  • Running "sudo -s" via System.Diagnostics.Process on Linux results in its standard input "hijacking" the program #103571
  • GetCustomAttribute cannot find attribute constructor #103722
  • [API Proposal]: Track Exceptions in flight (information about the state that existed for the thread when the exception occurred) #98878
  • [Linux] DirectoryServices.Protocols does not connect to AD-Server #102310

PullRequests

Created

  • Update to preview 7 #103789
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: rely on DFS for cycle entry detection in optRemoveRedundantZeroInits #103788
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Enable compaction of all `BBJ_ALWAYS` blocks #103785
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update HWIntrinsicInfo::lookupId to use a binary search #103778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [workloads] Don't load mono librarymode targets if PublishAot is set #103777
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Use bitshift instead of multiply in Unsafe.Add intrinsic if possible #103775
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Revert "[wasm] Intrinsics for blazor" #103774
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [HttpClientFactory] Do not log query string by default #103769
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • [browser][publish] Windows has problems with AOT build/publish for long paths #103766
    arch-wasm, os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • Avoid substring allocation in Environment.ReadXdgDirectory #103765
    needs-area-label
  • Avoid char[] allocation in AltSvcHeaderParser #103764
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Use a hash table for HW intrinsic name -> ID lookups #103763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ILCompiler: don't strip debug info from 'ilc' during source-build. #103760
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Skip exact interface matches when an interface has variance #103757
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • [browser] Use StaticWebAssets fingerprinting in Wasm SDK #103755
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] upgrade to WASIp2 #103752
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Avoid a couple string allocs in EventSource's ManifestBuilder ctor #103744
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Use span-based dictionary lookup in System.Console #103742
    area-System.Console
  • Use SRM's TypeName parser in ILLink #103740
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Added SVE APIs - `Test*`, `Extract*` #103739
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve

Merged

  • [Wasm] Ensure traling slash in OutputPath #103768
    area-Build-mono
  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Implement metrics advice API #102524
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Use fgUpdateConstTreeValueNumber where appropriate #103771
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Changed TensorSpan and ReadOnlyTensorSpan layout for better performance. #103244
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Performance improvements in `JsonValue`. #103733
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • Add area-System.Formats.Nrbf to area owners file. #103773
    area-Meta
  • `InlineArray`'s `Equals` and `GetHashCode` throw #103612
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, breaking-change, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Specialize `fgFindJumpTargets` #103761
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change fgMorphMultiOp to fgMorphHWIntrinsic #103732
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable ServerSendsTrailingHeader test on 8.0 #103762
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove leftover disable parallelization on H/3 #103748
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix wrong CONTEXT_UNWOUND_TO_CALL from special APC on ARM64 #103731
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Don't allocate unnecessary SslCtx #103720
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Arm AdvSimd: Rename StoreVectorMxN to Store #103689
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix downwards loop transformation with multiply executed exiting blocks #103723
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Additional cleanup and acceleration of the System.Numerics vector and related types #103527
    area-System.Numerics
  • Create portable box helper and wrap the thread-local alloc context in a struct #103607
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add an IsKnownConstant path to SinCos #103724
    area-System.Numerics

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2478691 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Create new X509CertificateLoader #102167
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [ICorProfiler] Add new API to enumerate GC Heap objects #103735
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add SearchValues<char> implementation for two sets of 128 chars #103216
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Stack allocate unescaped boxes #103361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Default DynamicCodeSupport to true for CoreCLR #103594
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Use new ABI classifiers for `GenTreeCall` arguments #103537
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • update proxy setting on registry changes #103364
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Add Avx512 support to IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher #103710
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Fix the ICU time format conversion logic #103681
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debugger support #98494
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • [cdac] start of Metadata contract; implement GetMethodTableData SOS method #103444
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Improve WebUtility.HtmlEncode / UrlEncode performance #103737
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Add Not, InsertIntoShiftedVector #103725
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • CI test #103646
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Set default for disableIntegrityCheck to true #102515
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • use also SslCertificateTrust when constructing CertificateContext #103372
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • Move src/native libraries that are shared between runtime builds to be targets-driven #103184
    EventPipe, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix Http 1.1's read-ahead task management #103257
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [Logging.EventSource] Add trace correlation fields #103655
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • remove unnecessary Avx512VL ISA flags. #103144
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution, avx512
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface::GetNestedExceptionData #103668
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add support for Sve.DuplicateSelectedScalarToVector() #103228
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add non-public SetEntryAssembly() API to System.Reflection #103726
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection, 8.0.x
  • [wasm][firefox] Test crit: OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverException: Failed to decode response from marionette #103706
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure
  • Improve Span.Count #103728
    area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • Enable nullable for HostFactoryResolver.Tests #103609
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • bump npm dependencies and lock file format #103639
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] Implement TODO in mono-threads-wasi.S #101337
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add AbsoluteCompare* APIs #102611
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Accelerate Vector128<long>::op_Multiply on x64 #103555
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Fix field accessor for RVA field #103705
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Make GC stress usable with Libraries tests #103738
    test-enhancement, area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • [HTTP/3] Support for HTTP/3 multiple connections #101531
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • CI test #99871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Caching: migrate HybridCache api surface from asp.net into runtime #103103
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • Convert some more array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove global spinlock for EH stacktrace #103076
    NO-MERGE, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [HybridGlobalization]Pass non-breaking space / narrow non-breaking space characters #103647
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • [NativeAOT] Adding CET support #102680
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Extract shared IL pattern analysis to a class #103701
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Take into account the provided format in Utf8Parser.TryParse for bool #100676
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Arm64/SVE: Implemented `Scale` and `Sqrt` #103663
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Arm64/SVE: Implemented `ReciprocalEstimate`, `ReciprocalExponent`, `ReciprocalSqrtEstimate`, `ReciprocalSqrtStep`, and `ReciprocalStep` #103673
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [DRAFT] More TypeName APIs #103713
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, binary-serialization
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Port yield normalization from CoreCLR to Native AOT #103675
    area-System.Threading

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-20
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Change the trigger for the runtime/main -> runtimelab/runtime-main #2617
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] support `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` on WASIp2 #2614
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] add some steps for wasi linux x64 #2605
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Stop publishing the Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers package when the SDK is released #41703
  • Enable bundling NativeAOT NuGet packages from runtime on non-vmr builds. #41687

Closed

  • dotnet runtime not showing up after installing, runtime, sdk, desktop, and app (version 8.0.6) #41666
  • [9.0-preview.5] dotnet test fails on Windows when error is logged to the test output #41541
  • Why is there no Linux version of MAUI? It is possible to do this with Rider or Andiroid studion or visual studio code, but since it is not available in the sdk, #41688
  • Date Conversion problem, I spent 1 day looking for this problem, then I found out that it is in .NET 8. Converted in .NEt5 and worked fine. could not do exactly this format. (Fri Jun 14 2024 11:19:16 GMT+0500 (Узбекистан, стандартное время)) #41567
  • Bug when handling Boolean values within Native -> C# callbacks #41662

PullRequests

Created

  • Preview 7 Branding #41704
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • DefaultRuntimeHostConfigurationOptions for WinForms trimming #41702
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41698
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Workflow] #41695
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Configuration] #41694
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workaround for VersionOption initializing to null on Mono. #41690
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/8.0.4xx] Backport https://github.com/dotnet/sdk/pull/41506 #41682
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41624
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use version comparison function #41102
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [Static Web Assets] Fix issue with externally defined static assets and compression clashes #41681
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix incremental build for extract-sdk-archive.proj #41671
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Unskip tests with Done issues + dotnet-format test fix #41684
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Mono Stage 2 Leg to VMR SB #41606
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add warning when targeting net standard less then 2.0 #41660
    untriaged
  • Update Documentation to fix issues when running `zsh` #41668
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Extensions #5497
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Add `private` and `namespace` accessibility modifiers for top-level types. #6794
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Update params-collections.md based on recent LDM decisions #8232
  • Open questions for field-backed properties #8231

Merged

  • Update overload resolution priority with LDM decisions #8233
  • Record decision to disallow record inline arrays in inline-arrays.md #8230
  • Update schedule #8229

Updated

  • Remove warning for `yield return` in `lock` #8220
  • Update first-class Span speclet #8221
  • Add notes for extensions WG 2024-06-14 #8217

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Prepend $(NoWarn) to list analyzer rule generates a false positive. #74087
  • Run a single generator at a time #74086
  • Can't see primary constructor variables in debugger #74082
  • Add IL Viewer for .NET languages #74080
  • Add string to NameOf option in intellisense #74079
  • Automatic class initialization scaffolding #74078
  • Add assembly version information to method tooltips #74077
  • switch expression: Warning CS8524 issued although all cases have been covered #74076
  • Task List filtering for current project doesn't work as expected #74074
  • [Bug] IDE0058 not work #74073
  • Error in 【MSBuildWorkspace.Create() .OpenSolutionAsync()】：System.Exception (cannotfound BuildHost) #74070

Closed

  • Make fields generated in a primary constructor able to be readonly #74081
  • ISymbol.ToMinimalDisplayString() ignores the SymbolDisplayTypeQualificationStyle.NameOnly formatting option. #74071

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle unspecified anonymous type property in VisualBasicOperationFactory #74091
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP logging #74090
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Fix error recovery for various nested conversion scenarios #74089
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • On the fly docs - add telemetry regarding documentation comments #74088
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Test #74085
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid re-running all codeaction requests at low priority. #74083
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid allocations in AbstractSyntaxIndex<>.GetIndexAsync #74075
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Disallow `InlineArray` attribute on a record struct type. #74072
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays

Merged

  • [LSP] Support "implementation" folding range kinds #74069
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add some missing LSP protocol definitions #74068
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Create new AsyncServiceProvider instead of using AsyncServiceProvider.GlobalProvider #74084
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Doc Cookbook Auto Interface Implementation #73906
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Remove fallbacks - 1 of n #74041
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ide options #74053
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enable end-to-end binding and emit for basic scenarios involving instance extension members. #74012
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Add a cancellation on typing for SmartRename if user begins to type #73949
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Require AddExplicitInterfaceImplementation for adding a type that implements member explicitly #73206
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Disable targeted notifications in integration tests #73987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when inferring unique method signature #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Simplify HostAnalysisScope storage #74055
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Generate schema with `readOnly: true` for computed properties and properties with `[ReadOnly(true)]` attribute #56353
  • object property causes build crash when generating OpenAPI document at build time #56351
  • Blazor template with 3 projects : Client , Server , Shared #56349
  • Perf regression: json_middleware #56348
  • Perf improvement: https, json #56347
  • [Blazor] Investigate why E2E tests aren't catching trimming issues #56344
  • Security concern with accessing server-side Blazor services from a different DI scope / semaphore needed? #56341
  • Special Character 'é' Causes 400 Bad Request Error with Header Value #56340
  • Provide access to signalr message size #56338
  • This is a dup of https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/issues/23195 which was closed due to inactivity. It does provide a workaround though #56337
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #56335
  • Support OOTB common log format #56334

Closed

  • Dictionary property causes build crash when generating OpenAPI document at build time #56307
  • .Net 9 Blazor compilation bug #56236
  • 400 Bad request, A valid antiforgery token was not provided with the request. - Still not fixed .net 8 #56325
  • OpenAPI parameter descriptions are written to the wrong location #56065
    9.0.0
  • [Blazor] [JSInterop] How do you marshal `ElementReference` from blazor into JS? #56319
  • "Show password" button present in password edit field is not accessible with keyboard:A11y_ASP.NET_Razor Pages_Login_Keyboard #56315
  • Blazor web app auto mode stop working some times. #56282
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #56328
  • Perf regression: mvc #56327

PullRequests

Created

  • Add `AuthorizationPolicyBuilder.RequireClaim` overload that take a `Predicate<Claim>` #56346
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Revert "Skip some Razor build tests to observe effect on test runner" #56343
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Update branding to preview7 #56352
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview7
  • Update milestones for August #56350
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview6
  • Fix urls in ProjectTemplates/README #55984
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview6
  • Re-plat on JsonExporter APIs and remove JsonSchemaMapper prototype #56330
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview6
  • SE.Redis DC backend / HybridCache : add net8.0 TFM #56122
    area-infrastructure, feature-caching, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview6
  • Skip some Razor build tests to observe effect on test runner #56292
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview6
  • [Blazor] Fix WebAssembly trimming issue #56333
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • [Blazor] Fix template tests #54606
    area-infrastructure
  • Quarantine RunAsync_CanFilterHealthChecks #56246
    area-healthchecks
  • Fix check for form parameters that don't need complex binding in RDG #56332
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Perf: ReasonPhrases as switch instead of Dictionary #56304
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Skip Templates.Mvc.Tests in Helix on Debian12 and Mariner #56291
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview6
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a7f443b` to `1d17ea1` #56232
    area-infrastructure
  • Bump ws from 7.5.9 to 7.5.10 #56275
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Add disable HTTP metrics endpoint metadata #56036
    area-hosting
  • Set the baggage even when the trace id is not successfully extracted #55341
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • libsosplugin.dylib: CoreCLR host crash on macOS Sonoma 14.4 on arm64 #4551
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add collocation option by default for manifest generation and improve error detection and logging #4748
  • Add an ExceptionTrigger to SOS manifest for Native AOT crashes #4749

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Hybrid & Web Solution Template: Template options need updating #23168
  • Starting Community Triagers process in our repo #23167
  • UIScrollView able to pan past content inside scrollview when zooming (iOS) #23163
  • Unable to compile iOS Binding Library #23162
  • [Windows] CascadeInputTransparent="False" not working for ScrollView and ContentView #23160
  • [BUG] ios LineBreakMode and MaxLines on Label controls does not work well #23159
  • Resize, when 200% Zoomed "Home Heading" is not adopting Zoom in "DotNet Home screen": A11y_.NET Core_Template App Home page_Hello World_Resize. #23154
    .NET 8 SR8
  • Moving one item between groups of a Grouped CollectionView results in the temporary fading out of two items instead of one on Android #23152
    Backlog
  • Resizetizer no longer applies fonts #23151
  • Maui Blazor Hybrid doesn't Import JavaScript #23149

Closed

  • DisplayActionSheet doesn't show up on macOS #18156
    .NET 8 SR6
  • ResourceDictionary get item operator weird behaviour #15312
  • [BUG] Grid is always InputTransparent (.NET MAUI 9.0 Preview 2) #21553
    Backlog
  • CascadeInputTransparent not working #19332
    Backlog
  • ContentView Touch Interaction works inappropriately when placing one above another ContentView. #11555
    Backlog
  • Setting FlyoutIsPresented="true" results in only the first two items being visible #7705
  • Flow direction is LeftToRight on iOS rtl language #8556
  • When Shell.NavBarIsVisible="False" open and close the flyout programmatically is not working #8532
  • Windows Appxmanifest version info not updating when csproj version info is updated #15073
  • Properties Height and Width have values equal -1 after Initialization of page components #8586
  • SelectionChangedCommand does not invoke in CollectionView twice when SelectionMode is Single on Windows #15677
  • Grid - HeightRequest and WidthRequest is not setting properly in SizeChanged event #16995
  • Grid Columns Affecting Row Resize Behaviour (WinUI/MacCatalyst) #15909
  • [Android] PRISM absolute navigation changes app window and MainActivity is being recreated #17233
  • Issue in Grid column sizing #17097
  • Publish a MAUI app for the Microsoft Store returns a ProcessorArchitecture error #19575
  • The target "StaticWebAssetsPrepareForRun" does not exist in the project. #22944
  • "System.ArgumentException: NaN is not a valid value for height" from `Rect.Size` getter #16571
    Backlog
  • CollectionView in Toolkit Popup not work properly #20012
    Triaged
  • [Windows] App based on FlyoutPage uses incorrect title bar colours when system is set to Dark theme and app set to Light theme - illegible content #23057
    .NET 8 SR8
  • after switching to 9.0.0.0-preview410690 project won't build #22967
  • Feature Request: Built-in function to open projects maximized and customizable mouse effects on specific elements #22988
    Triaged
  • [MAUI]Clicking on the page will trigger opening the page twice and you must return twice before you can return to the original page #22966
    Triaged
  • [Android][Handler/Layout Engine] Custom Entry with TextInputLayout won't respect layout width #21150
  • Blazor Hybrid template doesn't work #23137
  • Severity Code Description Project File Line Suppression State Error MSB4044 The "GenerateRtxt" task was not given a value for the required parameter "JavaPlatformJarPath". InfinityTrafficMobile C:\Program Files\dotnet\packs\Microsoft.Android.Sdk.Windows\34.0.52\tools\Xamarin.Android.Resource.Designer.targets 65 #23140
  • MAUI for Linux #23150

PullRequests

Created

  • NavHost cannot be null on Back key pressed - fix #23170
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨
  • Wire RefreshView up to our xplat layout workflow #23169
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak in TabbedPage #23166
    memory-leak 💦
  • [ios/catalyst] fix more cycles in `NavigationPage` #23164
    memory-leak 💦
  • [Windows] Respect `ClearButtonVisibility = ClearButtonVisibility.Never` for `<Entry>`s #23158
    community ✨
  • Fixes #18204 border lagging behind content on iOS and improves initial render performance #23156
    community ✨

Merged

  • Remove a couple extra commits that made it into the wrong branch #23165
  • [ios] fix leak in ListView *Cells #23143
    area-controls-listview, memory-leak 💦
  • Merge SR 6 into main #23161
  • Fix Action Sheets for macOS #19629
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-dialogalert, stale
  • `Size` and `SizeF` should not throw on `NaN` #22890
    area-core-platform
  • [Windows] Ensure titlebar button foreground colors use app theme #23144
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window
  • Fix failing tests on net9 branch #23147
  • Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx-sr6' into main #23146

Updated

  • WIP: HybridWebView control for integrating JS/HTML/CSS easily into a .NET MAUI app #22880
    do-not-merge, area-controls-hybridwebview, 9.0-preview6
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, .NET 9 Planning
  • Add possibility to run UI tests per category (or any filter) #22609
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-infrastructure
  • Improve performance and stability of `BindableLayout` #23136
    area-layout, community ✨
  • Fix <ApplicationTitle> encoding in maui templates #22084
    area-templates, community ✨, stale
  • Simplify Development.md #23142
    area-infrastructure
  • Enable Binding inteceptors source generator by default #22856
    area-core-platform
  • Split bindings source generated code into multiple files #23116
    area-xaml
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area-layout, platform/android 🤖, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • ContentView and ScrollView also need to handle InputTransparent #21025
    area-controls-scrollview
  • Title not updated after OnAppearing for TabbedPage - fix #23076
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • Add mapper for IsSwipePagingEnabledProperty on Android #23129
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • [ci] Set OfficialBuildId when building asset manifests #23102
    area-infrastructure
  • Optimize resetting gesture recognizers #19987
    community ✨, stale, area-gestures
  • [net9.0] Merge main into net9.0 #23126
    area-infrastructure
  • [Android] Android Ecosystem version bumps #23117
    area-infrastructure
  • [net9.0] Move to 9.0.100.preview6 #23021
    area-infrastructure
  • Make `MeasureInvalidated` event work correctly #23052
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • [Windows] FilePicker picking multiple files is very slow because of `FutureAccessList` use #23047
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • Fixed the picker title's color #23075
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • fix: fix 23131 can`t reuse BottomItem`s tabEnabled #23132
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cosmos type mapper does not call plugins first #34041
    9.0.0
  • SQL Server functional tests take twice as long after recent Arcade update #34039

Closed

  • TransactionScope.Dispose causes a `A root ambient transaction was completed before the nested transaction. The nested transactions should be completed first` error #33726
  • Issue: TransactionScope Error - "The current TransactionScope is already complete. You should dispose the TransactionScope." #33812
  • SQL Server: Translate string.TrimStart/End overloads accepting characters to trim #22924
    9.0.0
  • Primitive collections support has not been enabled. where to enabled #34038
  • Additional annotations are not added to design mode with UseModel #34032
  • Cosmos: Translate SelectMany #17312
    9.0.0
  • Align Cosmos query pipeline code with latest relational code #33032
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: add support for ElementAt(OrDefault) #29497
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: translate indexing into collection #25701
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: translate Length/Count on collections #25700
    9.0.0
  • EFCore 3.1 + CosmosDb can't translate any() on owned object #20441
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: Translate composition over embedded non-primitive collection #16926
    9.0.0
  • Compiled model: An item with the same key has already been added #33874
    9.0.0
  • CosmosDB Provider with FindAsync + Private Constructor results in Exception #29286
    9.0.0
  • "bad protocol version" error with `dotnet ef database update` on Mac #34040

PullRequests

Created

  • Cosmos: Minor refactoring of array extraction/conversion as extension methods (trivial) #34045
  • Cosmos: Stop nesting results in extra JSON object #34044
  • Changes and tests for Cosmos type mapping #34042

Merged

  • TrimStart and TrimEnd with optional char array implementation for SQL Server #33715
  • update branding for preview 6 #34043
  • Disable startup assembly support for MSBuild integration #34034
  • Cosmos: Implement SelectMany #34013
  • Cosmos querying over arrays of structural type #33998
  • Generate Accessors for shadow properties and columns #33996

Updated

  • API review changes #33412
  • [release/2.1] Update image to macOS-12 #34035
    tell-mode
  • [release/6.0] Update image to macOS-12 #34036
    tell-mode
  • [release/8.0] Update image to macOS-12 #34037
    tell-mode
